## Hash.BrowserHashNormalizer.sha256Hash() method

Compute SHA-256 hash using Web Crypto API. Note: This is an async operation but provides a sync interface by throwing an error that directs users to use the async version from @<!-- -->fgv/ts-web-extras.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static sha256Hash(parts: string[]): string;
```
